text: Hey folks. I was wondering if there is a way to embed Tikz diagrams in a `Weave.jl` file--meaning can Weave compile a tikz diagram? Is this working for anyone, or not yet. I looked at the repo and there is a mention of this in the issues, but the GenTex.jl package is deprecated now. Thanks.

elements.text: Hey folks. I was wondering if there is a way to embed Tikz diagrams in a
